Song.title: All Glory Be to Christ
Song.copyright: Words by Dustin Kensrue | Traditional Tune: Auld Lang Syne. © 2012 We Are Younger We Are Faster Music (Admin. by Music Services, Inc.)

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: Should [E]nothing of our [Emaj9(no3rd)]efforts stand, no [C#m]legacy surv[A]ive Un[E]less the Lord does [Emaj9(no3rd)]raise the house, in [A]vain its builders st[E]rive To [E]you who boast [Emaj9(no3rd)]tomorrow’s gain, tell [C#m]me what is your l[A]ife A [E]mist that vanis[Emaj9(no3rd)]hes at dawn, all g[A]lory be to Ch[E]rist!
Chorus: All g[E]lory be to [Emaj9(no 3rd)]Christ our king! All [C#m]glory be to Ch[A]rist! His r[E]ule and reign we’ll [Emaj9(no3rd)]ever sing, all g[A]lory be to Ch[E]rist!
Verse 2: His [E]will be done, His [F#m]kingdom come, on e[A]arth as is a[B]bove Who [E]is Himself our [F#m]daily bread, praise [A]Him the Lord of l[E]ove Let [E]living water s[F#m]atisfy the th[A]irsty without pri[B]ce We’ll t[E]ake a cup of [F#m]kindness yet, all [A]glory [B]be to Ch[E]rist!
{key:Eb} Verse 3: [E]Whe[-]n [Emaj]on the day the [EMaj]great I Am, the [C#m]faithful and the [A]true The [E]Lamb who was for [EMaj]sinners slain, is [A]making all things [E]new. Be[E]hold our God shall [EMaj]live with us and [C#m]be our steadfast [A]light And [E]we shall ere his pe[EMaj]ople be, all [A]glory be to C[E]hrist!
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 should nothing of our efforts stand no legacy survive unless the lord does raise the house in vain its builders strive to you who boast tomorrows gain tell me what is your life a mist that vanishes at dawn all glory be to christ chorus all glory be to christ our king all glory be to christ his rule and reign well ever sing all glory be to christ verse 2 his will be done his kingdom come on earth as is above who is himself our daily bread praise him the lord of love let living water satisfy the thirsty without price well take a cup of kindness yet all glory be to christ verse 3 when on the day the great i am the faithful and the true the lamb who was for sinners slain is making all things new behold our god shall live with us and be our steadfast light and we shall ere his people be all glory be to christ
